content:
@Hanna Lachnitt I opened a final PR in your master branch for Deutsch's algo. Please add an authorship section and open a PR in my master branch.
Even if Deutsch's algo is done, it's still good to open a topic dedicated to it in case some people want to discuss it further.

I plan to rename the theory . Deutsch would be shorter and as descriptive as the current name Deutsch_Algorithm. In the same way, I would rename Deutsch_Jozsa_Algorithm with Deutsch_Jozsa. I don't foresee any confusion that could arise as a result.
@Hanna Lachnitt What is your opinion ?

I also think there wouldn't be any confusion. I will rename Deutsch_Jozsa_Algorithm to Deutsch_Jozsa in my fork.
Also should the definition deutsch_algo be renamed into deutsch_algo_without_meas or something? Since the algorithm includes strictly speaking the measurement.

I also think there would not be any confusion. I will rename Deutsch_Jozsa_Algorithm to Deutsch_Jozsa in my fork.

Don't worry, I will make a PR.

Also should  the definition deutsch_algo be renamed into deutsch_algo_without_meas or something? Since the algorithm includes strictly speaking the measurement.

I don't think so.
